title: Matrix's Katz on Utilities: Declare Victory and Sell (Audio)
itunes:title: Matrix's Katz on Utilities: Declare Victory and Sell (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: David Katz, President and CIO of Matrix Asset Advisors, with a look at markets and investments, his current stock picks, and why he is selling utilities.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
